attributes.title: Review
attributes.review: These app took over 12 days to download and it wouldn’t let me look at it and let me do anything

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!!!
attributes.review: honestly i don’t even know what to say. this app is TERRIBLE!! as soon as i opened the app, i was asked to give my phone number. that is a HUGE invasion of privacy and i felt threatened. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!! IT IS TERRIBLE !!!

attributes.title: No! No! No!
attributes.review: Absolute garbage, nothing works on this app! The person who created or owns this app completely ruined it! It makes no sense. This app needs to go! No point to it, it is horrible! (TIK TOK RULES TRUMP!)

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: it takes forever to download and lots of storage 👎🏽. now i can’t play subway surfers because my storage is too full.😔

attributes.title: Where do I begin
attributes.review: I’ll make this short and sweet DO NOT and I mean DO NOT download this app it hacks into your accounts and uses your phones number

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: It tried asking me for private info and I am not willing to give that out. It also took for ever to download. I hate this app

attributes.title: Help
attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking I was going to be okay and then the app started sending me videos of Trump telling me to kill myself. That’s horrifying

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I tried to use this app but it was buggy as all heck. Nothing worked properly, and it leaked all my info. Honestly should be considered a national security risk tbh.

attributes.title: bOnK
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it asked me to send nudes. Like first of all are u not gonna give me flowers or something anyway don’t download it makes your phone explotar yee yee
I wanted to support my AMAziNg president that’s not racist homophobic or a pedofile but this app was way too unprofessional, like asking for my phone number and taking days to download
